name: Intro to Queer of Colour Critique
description: This course provides an introduction to the intersections between race, gender and sexuality through an exploration of the political theories, activisms and cultural forms of LGBTQ people of colour. It examines the emergence of queer of colour theory and critiques, and the ways in which the intersections of race, gender and sexuality figure in national, global, economic, & cultural structures.
prerequisites: SDS255H1/SDS256H1 or permission of the instructor
